description:
As their match approaches, Subaru tries to win back Seiji`s friendship. His latest attempt includes a special guest appearance on Ran-Ga Channel.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Come Back, My Friend! Casting a Spell with a Wish!
Modore Tomo yo! Negai o Kometa Cast!!
もどれ友よ! 願いを込めたキャスト!!
